description:
- Develop, pitch, and execute digital marketing strategies for clients.
- Create comprehensive paid media strategies for B2B SaaS clients.
- Utilize data to define target audiences and conduct keyword research.
- Manage planning and setup of digital marketing campaigns.
- Develop and manage campaign budgets to maximize ROI.
- Monitor campaign performance and adjust strategies.
- Implement retargeting campaigns and A/B testing.
- Provide performance reports and insights to clients.
- Present strategies and updates to clients and stakeholders.
- Collaborate with creative team for ad content development.
- Contribute to Tiller's own paid media campaigns.
- Collaborate with various roles to deliver client value.
- Stay updated with trends in paid media and digital marketing.
